item.title: Hotel & Restaurant Spada Reale
item.description:
ğŸ· Overview

Official website of Spada Reale, a charming hotel and restaurant in the heart of Roaschia (Italy).

Built with Hugo, the project is fully customized, multilingual (Italian, English, French), responsive, and optimized for display on shopfront screens (night mode enabled).

It features dedicated sections for rooms, restaurant, local shop, regional products, and contact details â€” all presented with an elegant layout and streamlined navigation.

item.title: Iuliana David - Mental Coach
item.description:
ğŸ§˜â€â™€ï¸ Description

Personal and professional website for Iuliana David, a mental coach specialized in personal growth and mental well-being.

Built with Hugo, the site is multilingual (Italian and Romanian), mobile-optimized, and designed to convey trust, empathy, and professionalism.

It includes sections for personal introduction, testimonials, contacts, and offered services, with a clean and welcoming style.

ğŸŒ Visit the website â†’

ğŸš€ Technologies

  • Hugo (ultrafast static site generator)
  • Custom HTML/CSS for a modern and accessible design
  • Netlify for continuous deployment
  • i18n for multilingual management (IT / RO)
  • Layout optimized for focus and readability

item.title: Agriturismo - La Ciapeleta
item.description:
ğŸ¡ Description

Official website of La CiapÃ©leta Farmhouse, a wonderful agriturismo with panoramic sea views in Ventimiglia (IM), Italy.

Built with Hugo and custom HTML/CSS, the site is lightweight, fast, and user-friendly â€” perfect even for hillside areas with limited connectivity. Each section was designed to reflect the authentic atmosphere of the property, using warm visuals and clear, welcoming text.

It features pages about rooms, restaurant, contact info, and booking.
The design is minimalist yet cozy, aligned with the visual identity of the farmhouse.

item.title: Palawan Tribe
item.description:
ğŸ§­ Description

Official website of Palawan Tribe Dolce Amore, a non-profit association supporting indigenous communities in Palawan, Philippines.

Built with â¤ï¸ by Manuel â€“ Assembler Computer, the site is multilingual (Italian & English), fast, sustainable, and designed to reflect the warmth and harmony of tribal life.

Includes sections on history, vision, photo gallery, and contact â€“ all optimized for mobile and slow connections, with ethical SEO and zero tracking.

item.title: Bed & Breakfast A Me CÃ
item.description:
ğŸ›ï¸ Description

Official website of Bed & Breakfast A Me CÃ , a charming family-run guesthouse located in Albisola Marina, just a few steps from the sea.

Designed with a mobile-first approach, the website was built using Hugo and custom HTML/CSS, offering a simple yet refined user experience â€” ideal for all age groups, including less tech-savvy users.

The layout is minimalist yet warm, with a palette inspired by the Ligurian coast.
It includes essential sections: introduction, photo gallery, contacts, and booking options.
Optimized for fast loading even on mobile networks.

item.title: TB Logistica S.r.l.
item.description:
ğŸš› Description

Official showcase website of TB Logistica S.r.l., a company operating in the field of transport and logistics across Italy.

The project was built using Hugo as a high-performance static site generator, with the goal of conveying reliability, corporate strength, and clarity of services.
It features a clean, professional, and fully responsive layout, designed for seamless browsing on both desktop and mobile.

The content structure includes company presentation, offered services, contact information, and key operational detailsâ€”crafted with maximum readability and SEO optimization.

item.title: Assembler Computer â€“ Workshop
item.description:
ğŸ› ï¸ Description

Complete redesign of the official website of Assembler Computer, an IT workshop and technical support center based in Cuneo, Italy.

The project was born from the need to replace an outdated static structure â€” both visually and technically â€” and build a modern, solid, and easily maintainable foundation.

The new website was developed using Hugo, with fully custom code, prioritizing:

  • service clarity
  • immediate navigation
  • visual consistency with Assembler Studio
  • high performance
  • simple and efficient management

The structure is essential and focused:
About, Services, Contact.

item.title: Assembler Studio
item.description:
ğŸ§  Description

Assembler Studio is the official portfolio website of Assembler Computer, designed to showcase and enhance the web projects developed over time, with a technical, minimal, and user experience-oriented approach.

Itâ€™s not just another showcase site, but a structured project that reflects the Assembler workflow:
clarity, full code control, top performance, and functional design.

Built entirely with Hugo, with no pre-made themes, to ensure maximum creative freedom, a solid base, and full scalability.
